name: "Lucky Penny" Necklace - CDN Olympic Fundraiser!
description:
Keep some Canadian luck on our side during the upcoming Olympic Winter Games in Sochi, Russia with this limited edition necklace! This piece features a unique, authentic Canadian copper penny. As pennies are now out of circulation in Canada, this is also a special Canadian keepsake piece. 
Keep a piece of Canadian history with you, and support our Canadian athletes this February! 

$25 from EVERY “Lucky Penny” necklace purchased will go directly to help support our Canadian Olympic athletes.

A brass disk etched with the word “LOVE” hangs with an authentic Canadian penny and a small brass Canadian maple leaf charm. The penny and maple leaf hang on separate ring than the love disk, allowing them to not sit directly on top of one another. This way, a bit of the brass colored love disk peaks out from behind the penny. The 2 pendants are then connected by the jump ring to assure they always stay together and hang perfectly around your neck. 

The penny and love disk are the same size, measuring 18mm across. The small golden maple leaf measures 10mm x 10mm.
The charms hang on a long (33”) bronze chain, adorned with our signature bronze leaf etched with our C&S logo. Like all of our necklaces, there are no clasps to bother with – just slip it on over your head.

** Please remember that all pennies vary in color due to their age – your necklace may include a slightly darker penny, or a slightly shinier penny. They are all unique and beautiful. Sorry, no requests for specific years or colors. **

Thank you for supporting our Canadian Olympic athletes in their pursuit of gold this February!

- SOCHI 2014 -

name: "Canada Love" Necklace - CDN Olympic Fundraiser!
description:
“Canada Love” Necklace – “Strong & Free” Olympic Fundraiser 

Show your love for Canada during the upcoming Olympic Winter Games in Sochi, Russia with this limited edition necklace! Hang your Canadian pride around your neck, and support our Canadian athletes this February! 

$25 from EVERY “Canada Love” necklace purchased will go directly to help support our Canadian Olympic athletes.

A large brass disk etched with the word “LOVE” hangs with a brass 3D wavey Canadian maple leaf charm. Simple and patriotic. 

The love disk measures 26mm across and the maple leaf measures 15mm x 12mm.
The charms hang on a long (33”) bronze chain, adorned with our signature bronze leaf etched with our C&S logo. Like all of our necklaces, there are no clasps to bother with – just slip it on over your head.

Thank you for supporting our Canadian Olympic athletes in their pursuit of gold this February!

- SOCHI 2014 -

name: “Golden Maple” Earrings – CDN Olympic Fundraiser
description:
Show your pride for Canada during the upcoming Olympic Winter Games in Sochi, Russia with these cute limited edition maple leaf studs! Adorn your ears with these beauties and support our Canadian athletes this February! 

$15 from EVERY pair of “Golden Maple” studs purchased will go directly to help support our Canadian Olympic athletes.

Cute brass maple leafs are fixed to gold plated, nickel-free earring posts and come with gold plated earring nut backings. The maple leafs measure 15mm x 13mm.

Thank you for supporting our Canadian Olympic athletes in their pursuit of gold this February!

- SOCHI 2014 -

name: Chalkboard Locket Necklace
description:
Wear a mini chalkboard around your neck and you will never be bored again! Write your name, play tic-tac-toe with a friend or just doodle your heart out. This locket also looks great as a solid black pendant when it's wiped clean.

A detailed vintage brass locket is covered in high quality chalkboard paint. A small brass piece of wheat or tiny anchor is adorned to the edge of the locket - Choose your style from the drop down menu below. You can also order the locket without any adornment if you want to keep it simple and have the full surface for your masterpieces!

The locket measures 38mm and hangs on a long (33") sturdy bronze chain. The locket opens up and photos can be placed inside.

Every locket will come with 1 piece of chalk!

name: "Hope Anchor" Necklace (Gold Plated)
description:
Wear this one off to the side for a unique look! A gold plated anchor sits 'in' the gold plated long-linked chain. The neck

The anchor measures 12 x 17mm and the chain measures 17" - the perfect "short" necklace chain! Email us or leave a message in the PayPal 'note to seller' section if you'd like it longer or shorter!

name: "Golden Feather" Necklace (Gold Plated)
description:
Perfect to wear during a casual day or a night on the town. A darling tiny brass feather sits 'in' a pretty gold plated chain. Wear this one straight or off to the side for a unique look!

This is a short necklace and measures 17" long - the perfect 'short' necklace length. Email us or leave a comment in the PayPal 'notes to seller' section if you want a specific length!

name: "Bird Harp" Necklace
description: Just like our classic, popular "Sage Harp" Necklace, this working Horner harmonica hangs with a bright blue bird instead of the small bronze leaf! This working harmonica is always the hit of the party! A mini Horner harmonica hangs on a long (33") bronze chain. All of C&S's long chains do not have clasps, since you slip them over your head anyways! No more worrying about the clasp showing. The harmonica measures 35x13mm and plays perfectly in the key of C. Buddy this one up with the blue "Flight" Bracelet "Flight" Bracelet for a great set!

name: "Wild Western Canada" Bottle Necklaces
description:
Carry a little piece of BC, Alberta and Saskatchewan around your neck! Wheat, rye grass and dried lilac flowers were hand picked from the Okanagan (BC), Calgary (AB) and Turtle Lake (SK) and placed inside small glass bottles. The cork top is glued in to keep it secure.

All bottles are different! Choose what you want in your bottle from the drop down menu below!

options.name: All 3 (Wheat, rye grass and lilac flowers)

name: "That Way" Hair Comb
description:
Just like our "This Way" Hair Comb, but every second triangle is enameled black! This one is super unique and looks great in any hair color.

These super popular hair combs always look great! And YES - they will stay in your hair! :) As long as these are put in correctly, they will hold your hair really well, no matter what hair type you have. We promise. 
 
In total, this comb measures 85mm x 48mm.

The trick to really make them stay in, is going against the way your hair is going. Pull the section of hair back and hold it with one hand, then push the hair comb forward (so the teeth of the comb are going towards your face). It’ll lock in that way and stay really well. You can also comb you hair back with the comb, then push it forwards (towards your face). Even if your hair is up and you want to use one, just always make sure you’re going against the way that the hair is going. As long as they are in correctly, they will feel super secure and look great all day! Contact us if you are having any problems and we can help you out!

name: "Large Autumn Leaves" Hair Comb
description:
4 different golden brass leaves are fixed to a sturdy silver hair comb.

These super popular hair combs always look great! And YES - they will stay in your hair! :) As long as these are put in correctly, they will hold your hair really well, no matter what hair type you have. We promise. 

In total, these combs measure 85mm x 48mm. When they are in your hair, only the leaves show and they measure about 85mm x 32mm.

The trick to really make them stay in, is going against the way your hair is going. Pull the section of hair back and hold it with one hand, then push the hair comb forward (so the teeth of the comb are going towards your face). It’ll lock in that way and stay really well. You can also comb you hair back with the comb, then push it forwards (towards your face). Even if your hair is up and you want to use one, just always make sure you’re going against the way that the hair is going. As long as they are in correctly, they will feel super secure and look great all day! Contact us if you are having any problems and we can help you out!

description:
Gorgeous golden brass leaves are fixed to a sturdy silver hair comb. 

These super popular hair combs always look great! And YES - they will stay in your hair! :) As long as these are put in correctly, they will hold your hair really well, no matter what hair type you have. We promise. 

The trick to really make them stay in, is going against the way your hair is going. Pull the section of hair back and hold it with one hand, then push the hair comb forward (so the teeth of the comb are going towards your face). It’ll lock in that way and stay really well. You can also comb you hair back with the comb, then push it forwards (towards your face). Even if your hair is up and you want to use one, just always make sure you’re going against the way that the hair is going. As long as they are in correctly, they will feel super secure and look great all day! Contact us if you are having any problems and we can help you out!

name: "Fleur & Love" Bobby Pin Set
description:
These little bobby pins are so sweet. Use them to pin your hair back or tuck into a regular bun.

One disk reads "LOVE" and the other has the pretty fleur de lis and they measure about 10mm across. They are sold as a set of 2!

name: "Sweetheart" Bobby Pin Set
description:
Pop these cute little hearts into an updo or use one to sweep one of your sides back.

Sweet little brass hearts are fixed to sturdy gold bobby pins. The hearts measure 10mm x 13mm and come in a set of 2 - perfect to wear on either side so that one is not upside down.

name: "Tri Again" Bobby Pin Set
description:
Keep these simple babies on hand to pin your bangs back or tuck up into a pony tail or bun. Perfect little addition to your order to pop into a stocking at Christmas time.

Little brass triangles are fixed to sturdy brass bobby pins, pointing in different directions. The triangles measure 10mm on each side. These are sold in a set of 2!

name: "Burst" Ring
description:
Catch people's eye with this gorgeous statement ring. These glass pieces are black with a golden finish to the top, making it really flash in the right light! Such a unique ring.

The top of the ring measures 18mm across and is fixed to a sturdy bronze adjustable ring with floral detail on the sides.

name: "Arrow Wrap" Ring
description:
Wear this one regularly or adjust it to a smaller size and wear it as a midi ring!

A brass arrow is wrapped into am adjustable ring. Part of the arrow is enameled in black. Enamel creates a durable surface that will not scratch, making this a long lasting ring.

name: "Lady Locket" Ring
description:
Another great locket ring! A tiny round vintage brass locket is attached to a lovely brass ring with a floral detail on the sides. The front is left plain and the locket opens up to reveal a tiny brass heart or a tiny brass bee! Choose which you'd like from the drop down menu below. If you'd like to add your own photo or treasure inside, you can choose for it to be left blank.

The lockets measure 12mm and all ring bands are adjustable. We recommend for you to paint the inside of the ring with clear nail polish to keep your finger from turning green from the natural brass over time.

name: "Tiny Antique Leaves" Earrings
description:
These tiny green patina leaves are a great pop of color. They hang on gold plated, nickel-free kidney wires.

Choose between long or short kidney wires from the drop down menu below.

Due to the patina process, please remember that each leaf is unique! We will pick you out 2 leaves that are most similar in color to each other.

name: "Tear Drop" Earrings
description:
Vintage black glass stones in vintage brass settings! These will look great with everything you own or make a great gift since they are classic and simple.

Choose between having them on long or shorter gold-plated kidney wires from the drop down menu below.

name: "The Hex" Stud Earrings
description: These will immediately be your go-to studs! Vintage brass hexagons are fixed to nickel-free earring posts.

name: "Lucky" Stud Earrings - RED!
description:
Our best selling turquoise "Lucky" Studs are now in red! Perfect for anytime but especially pretty around the holidays.

Vintage red and gold glass is etched  and set on nickel-free earring posts.

These little studs measure 9mm across.

name: "Little Locket" Stud Earrings
description:
These tiny locket earrings are adorable and will go with everything. The vintage brass lockets open up and the tiniest photo can be put inside, or just leave them empty!

The lockets measure 11mm and are on nickel-free earring posts with gold earnuts.

name: Engraved Hinge Bangles
description:
These one-of-a-kind brass bangles are enameled then engraved by hand with a variety of words. The brass from under the enamel comes through beautifully and each one is 100% unique!

Choose between the words "hello," "bestie" and "love" (not shown but photo coming soon!).

Custom orders are also available for just an extra $5! Just select "Custom order" from the drop down menu below and send us an email or a PayPal note when you pay with what word or name you want! Shorter 3-4 letter quotes can also be done. 

SOLD OUT - more will be in stock in early January! Email us to reserve one if you'd like!

name: "Path to Autumn" Bracelet
description:
This bracelet couldn't be cuter and is perfect for all seasons. A tiny bronze acorn and pine cone hang off of a copper colored chain. 

The acorn measures just 10mm long and the pine cone measures just 12mm long. The bracelet is 7" long in total but contact us if you'd like a specific size!

name: "Hope Anchor" Bracelet (Gold Plated)
description:
Wear a little hope with this sweet gold plated anchor bracelet. The anchor, chain, jump rings and clasp are all gold plated and anti-tarnishing.

The bracelet measures approximately 7" in length. Let us know if you'd like a specific length.

name: "Northern Oak" Bracelet (Gold Plated)
description:
Dainty and sweet. A brass oak leaf is linked with sturdy gold plated chain and a gold plated clasp.

The oak leaf measures 38mm x 15mm and the bracelet is approx. 7" in total length. Let us know if you want it to be a specific size!

name: "Cupid" Bracelet (Gold Plated)
description:
The perfect bracelet for layering or wearing on its own! This gold plated arrow is linked with 2 different chunky bronze chains and a sturdy bronze clasp.

The arrow measures about 46mm long and the bracelet in total length measures 180mm (approx. 7"). The bracelet is adjustable as you can attach the clasp anywhere on the thick chain to have it fit your wrist perfectly.

name: "Simple Feather" Cuff Bracelet
description:
An immediate favorite of this new collection! This minimalist cuff bracelet is understated and gorgeous. Perfect to wear with a watch or other bracelets or just on its own.

Choose between gold (brass) or blue (patina) from the drop down menu below. Please note that due to the patina process, all of the blue feathers are completely unique in color.

These cuffs are perfect for medium to smaller wrists! If you are someone who can never buy bracelets because they are always too big, this is definitely the bracelet for you.

The feather measures 32mm x 7mm.

name: "Bon Voyage" Cufflinks
description:
These are the perfect gift for guy who loves to travel, is moving away for a job, or is just a lover of boats!

Brass disks etched with the words "Bon Voyage" and a boat, are fixed to high quality shiny brass cufflinks. 

The disks measure 15mm across (about the size of a penny).

name: "Tiny Fleur" Cufflinks
description:
Perfect for the man who likes smaller cufflinks! Small brass disks etched with the fleur de lis are fixed to high quality shiny brass cuff links.

The disks measure about 11mm across.

name: "Horseshoe & Steer" Alberta Flood Relief Necklace
description:
-----
Choose your donation amount from the drop down menu below! 

Remember that 100% of ALL proceeds will go to the Canadian Red Cross Alberta Floods Fund!

See the other Alberta Flood Relief necklace style HERE: http://cinderandsage.bigcartel.com/product/alberta-flood-relief-necklaces

The large "LOVE" pendants on the necklaces measure about 1"x1" and are on 33" long chains (our classic "long" necklace length).
PLEASE NOTE: DUE TO HIGH DEMAND, THE CHAINS WILL VARY (But they are all beautiful and of the same high quality!)

* If you are located in Calgary and would like to pick up your necklace instead of having it mailed out, please use the coupon code "YYCPICKUP" at check out (and you will not be charged shipping). You will get an email notifying you when and where pick up will be in the coming days! Thanks!

-------------
Like everyone else in Alberta, the flood has impacted me greatly. I was one of the few 'lucky' evacuees in the hard-hit Mission area in Calgary.

As a born and raised Calgarian, this city means everything to me. It is my heart and it's been so hard to see it in the state it's in. Like many, I immediately felt the need to donate and help in any way I can. Alberta has always been an inspiration behind a lot of my work with Cinder & Sage, so it only felt right to raise more money than I could have donated myself, by making special Cinder & Sage flood relief necklaces.

Wear your love for Alberta proudly around your neck!... 100% of the sales of these pieces will go to the Canadian Red Cross to aid in flood relief in Calgary and surrounding areas. Donate a minimum of $40 for the necklace of your choice!

- Lindsay (Owner / Designer)
-------------

name: "Drifting Leaves" Bobby Pins Set
description:
Add some pretty to a simple hair-day. The perfect 3 pack of simple gold leaves to adorn your locks! Wear one at a time, 2 at a time, or all 3 at once when your hair is up or down.

3 different brass leaves are attached to sturdy gold bobby pins. You'll get all 3 leaves pictured!

The bobby pins (including leaves) are about 50mm in length. The leaves alone are 27x11mm, 33x10mm, and 28x17mm.

name: “Adorned Vintage Lockets”
description:
Our ever-popular vintage covered lockets, now adorned with tiny brass arrows or hearts! 

Arrows and hearts can be placed on any of our lockets – Map Lockets, Dictionary Definition Lockets, or Black and White lockets. Example: Custom order a Vintage Map Locket with an arrow pointing where ever you want – to a specific city, country or small town. Or have us place a tiny brass heart near a certain spot, or just on the left hand corner of the locket if you feel a general over all love for the area! 

The paper is sealed onto the locket with numerous coats of sealant and varnish and the adornment will be securely glued into place. The locket can open and photos can be placed inside. It hangs on a long (33") bronze chain. All of C&S's long chains do not have clasps, since you slip them over your head anyways! No more worrying about the clasp showing. 

The locket measures 46x38mm and may contain some age spots which just adds to the character and beauty of the locket. All of these lockets are done by hand and made to order, so your locket will appear not completely identical to the one shown, but very similar.

name: “Gold-Enriched Vintage Lockets”
description:
Our ever-popular black and white vintage lockets - now enriched with liquid gold! These are all hand painted and of course, one of a kind. 

Choose between the “Rocky Mountains” Alberta Photo Locket which has the fir trees in the foreground hand painted in liquid gold, or the “This Old Barn” Alberta Photo Locket which subtlely has the small fence hand painted in the gold.  Choose from the drop down menu below.

The paper is sealed onto the locket with numerous coats of sealant and varnish and the gold is also covered in a layer of varnish. The locket can open and photos can be placed inside. It hangs on a long (33") bronze chain. All of C&S's long chains do not have clasps, since you slip them over your head anyways! No more worrying about the clasp showing. 

The locket measures 46x38mm and may contain some age spots which just adds to the character and beauty of the locket. All of these lockets are done by hand and made to order, so your locket will appear not completely identical to the one shown, but very similar.

name: “Fire Starter” Bottle Necklace
description:
In case of emergency – Break glass!

Be safe at all times.... These small glass bottles are filled with real twigs and real matches! Just break the glass bottle open if you are ever stuck in the woods, needing to make a fire to keep warm ;)

They hang on a long (33") bronze chain with no clasp - just slip it on over your head. All bottles are 100% one-of-a-kind! The corks are glued in so that they will never pop out while you wear them.

Choose between 2 sizes from the drop down menu below.

name: “Gold Leaf” Bottle Necklace
description:
A truly gorgeous, unique piece that you can dress up or down.  Real gold leaf is carefully placed inside the glass bottles. Each one is one of a kind and are stunning when the gold hits the light.

The bottles hang on a long (33") bronze chain with no clasp - just slip it on over your head. The corks are glued in so that they will never pop out while you wear them.

Choose between 2 sizes from the drop down menu below.

name: “Love Bird” Necklace
description:
Sweet and smiple. A small brass swallow bird sits on top of a large brass disk etched with the word LOVE.  You’ll want to wear this one with everything.

The piece hangs on a long (33") bronze chain with no clasp - just slip it on over your head. The LOVE disk measures  1”x1” – the perfect size pendant.

name: “Simple Initial” Necklace (Gold Plated)
description:
Personal and sweet. Choose any letter that you want!... Your first or last initial, your significant other’s initial, your child’s initial, etc. All letters are gold plated and hang on a short (17” in length) fine gold plated chain with gold plated clasp. (The chain is very fine so that it can fit through the holes in the letters). This necklace is dainty and perfect for wearing everyday along with your other favorite Cinder & Sage pieces.

The tiny letters measure approximately 7x5mm and almost all are available. Choose your letter from the drop down menu below. If you do not see the one you’d like, please email us and we may be able to do a special order.

name: “Initial Love” Necklace (Gold Plated)
description:
Love at first sight. Choose any letter that you want to hang with a heart!... Your first or last initial, your significant other’s initial, your child’s initial, etc. All letters and hearts are gold plated and hang on a short (17” in length) fine gold plated chain with gold plated clasp. (The chain is very fine so that it can fit through the holes in the letters). This necklace is dainty and perfect for wearing everyday along with your other favorite Cinder & Sage pieces.

The tiny letters measure approximately 7x5mm and the hearts measure 7x7mm. Choose your letter from the drop down menu below. If you do not see the one you’d like, please email us and we may be able to do a special order.

name: “Hi There” Necklace (Gold Plated)
description:
Say “hi” with the friendliest necklace ever. The letters are gold plated and hang on a short (17” in length) fine gold plated chain with gold plated clasp. (The chain is very fine so that it can fit through the holes in the letters). This necklace is dainty and perfect for wearing everyday along with your other favorite Cinder & Sage pieces.

The tiny letters measure approximately 7x5mm.

name: “Anchors Away” Necklace (Gold Plated)
description:
A necklace you will want to wear every day. A perfect gold plated anchor hangs on a short (17” in length) detailed gold plated chain with gold plated clasp. (Please let us know in your PayPal check out ‘note to seller’ section if you would like a specific length). This necklace is perfect for wearing everyday along with your other favorite Cinder & Sage pieces.

The anchor measures 12 x 17mm.

name: "Hero" Key Chain
description:
You’ll always be the hero when you pull out this handy bottle opener key chain when someone is in need! These are made of solid brass and are attached to a strong keychain ring.

Great for men or women! Use this on your key ring or attach it to your purse or backpack.

name: “This Way” Hair Comb
description:
Slightly tribal and super chic, this geometric hair comb will go with anything and YES - they will stay in your hair! :) As long as these are put in correctly, they will hold your hair really well, no matter what hair type you have. We promise. .
 
Measurements coming soon.

How to put in a hair comb:
The trick to really make a hair comb stay in, is putting it in against the way your hair is going. Pull the section of hair back and hold it with one hand, then push the hair comb forward (so the teeth of the comb are going towards your face). It’ll lock in that way and stay really well. You can also comb you hair back with the comb, then push it forwards (towards your face). Even if your hair is up and you want to use one, just always make sure you’re going against the way that the hair is going. As long as they are in correctly, they will feel super secure and look great all day! Contact us if you are having any problems and we can help you out!

description:

name: “Tiny Arrow” Bobby Pin
description:
These bobby pins have already proven to be super popular! A small brass arrow is secured onto a brass bobby pin. The perfect addition to your hair when it’s up or down. 

Measurements coming soon.

Order 1 for $12 or 2 for $20! Select from the drop down menu below.

name: “Simple Chain” Stacking Ring (Gold Plated)
description:
This ring my look too simple but once it’s on, you will never want to take it off. Roll on this thin gold plated chain ring and wear it stacked with other rings or just on its own. Because it is gold plated, feel free to wash our hands with it on and keep it on all day and night! 
(Note: Gold plating can eventually wear off with the everyday oils from your fingers, so showering with it on is not recommended).

Choose your ring size from the drop down menu below. If you are usually half size in rings, go up to the closest size.

name: “Tiny Anchor” Ring
description:
The cutest ring you will own. A tiny, super lightweight brass anchor hangs from a thin adjustable ring. The anchor will flip around all day but not to the point where it will bug you since the anchor is so tiny and light. This ring is perfect for stacking with other thin rings.

Measurements coming soon.

name: “Golden Leaf” Ring
description:
A perfect statement ring. 

A flat brass leaf sits on a bronze ring with a pretty floral pattern that goes up the sides. The ring is adjustable and can fit any ring size.

The leaf measures 28mm long and 18mm wide.

name: “Etched” Ring
description:
Just like the super popular “Etched” stud earrings, this ring is a stunner. A black glass cab etched with gold sits on a bronze ring with a floral pattern that goes up the sides. The ring is adjustable and can fit any ring size.

The domed cab measures 18mm across.

name: “Cash Money” Money Clips
description:
These make an awesome gift for the man in your life. Or, ladies, use them to hold all of your royalty and gift cards together in your purse! 

Choose between 3 styles of these strong brass money clips:

- “One World” Money Clip – Brass world (showing the western hemisphere) with a C&S logo leaf on the back.

- “Stache” Money Clip – Tiny black mustache with a C&S logo leaf on the back.

- “Plain Jane” Money Clip – Blank on the front except for a tiny C&S logo leaf – perfect for getting engraved!

These measure 50mm x 25mm.

name: “Identity Cuff” Bracelet
description:
The perfect addition to your bracelet party. These brass cuff bracelets are completely customizable – get your initial or a letter that is significant to you in some way. 

Choose your letter from the drop down menu below - A limited number of certain letters are available at the moment. If you don’t see the letter you need, contact us via email and we may be able to work out a special order for you.

Measurements coming soon. These bracelets will fit most but is especially perfect for slightly smaller wrists! Larger cuffs are also available – please contact before ordering to request the larger size.

name: “Coin Cuff” Bracelets
description:
Sweet cuff bangles, perfect to wear mixed with other bracelets or a watch. Choose between the “Love” or the “Going Steady” cuff. 

The round disks measure 18mm across.  These bracelets will fit most but is especially perfect for slightly smaller wrists! Larger ones also available but please contact us for those.

name: Hinge Bracelets
description:
Brass hinged bangles, perfect to wear mixed with other bracelets or a watch. Choose between 3 styles:

1. Gold-leafed Arrow – real gold leaf is applied by hand and sealed onto the faceplate of the bracelet, with a small brass arrow ontop.

2. Gold-leafed Logo – real gold leaf is applied by hand and sealed onto the faceplate of the bracelet. A small Cinder & Sage logo leaf charm is attached.

3. Golden Wheat – a brass piece of wheat attached to the blank brass faceplate.

Measurements coming soon.  These bracelets will fit most but is especially perfect for slightly smaller wrists!

SOLD OUT - more will be in stock in early January! Email us to pre-order.

name: Vintage Map Card Cases
description:
Brass card cases covered in an original old map. All are one of a kind. Great for business cards or for holding your credit cards and money in your little clutch for a night out on the town! 

Cases measure 93mm x 57mm.

name: “Yes, No, Maybe So” Earrings
description:
Yes, No? Why not.  Sweet brass disks reading “Oui” and “Non” (“Yes” and “No” in French) hang on gold plated, nickel-free earring hooks.

(Measurements coming soon)

name: “Drop the Anchor” Earrings
description:
These earrings are perfect with any summer outfit! Super lightweight and incredibly cute. Tiny brass anchors hang on gold plated, nickel-free kidney wires. 

(Measurements coming soon)

name: “Fresh Leaves” Earrings
description:
Dress these up or down! Gorgeous wavey brass leaves hang on gold plated, nickel-free kidney wires. 

(Measurements coming soon)

name: "View From Our Tent" Alberta Photo Locket
description:
A vintage photo taken in Banff National Park in Alberta, Canada on a refinished vintage brass locket. The photo shoes large old trees with the Rocky Mountains in the background. The photo is sealed onto the locket with numerous coats of sealant and varnish. The locket can open and photos can be placed inside.

It hangs on a long (33") bronze chain. All of C&S's long chains do not have clasps, since you slip them over your head anyways! No more worrying about the clasp showing. 

The locket measures 46x38mm and may contain some age spots which just adds to the character and beauty of the locket. All of these lockets are done by hand and made to order, so your locket will appear not completely identical to the one shown, but very similar.

name: "Banff Ave Stroll" Alberta Photo Locket
description:
A vintage photo of Banff Ave in Banff, Alberta, Canada on a refinished vintage brass locket. The photo is sealed onto the locket with numerous coats of sealant and varnish. The locket can open and photos can be placed inside.

It hangs on a long (33") bronze chain. All of C&S's long chains do not have clasps, since you slip them over your head anyways! No more worrying about the clasp showing. 

The locket measures 46x38mm and may contain some ages spots which just adds to the character and beauty of the locket. All of these lockets are done by hand and made to order, so your locket will appear not completely identical to the one shown, but very similar.

name: "Rodeo" Alberta Photo Locket
description:
A vintage photo of a cowboy at the 1923 Calgary Stampede in Calgary, Alberta, Canada on a refinished vintage brass locket. The photo is sealed onto the locket with numerous coats of sealant and varnish. The locket can open and photos can be placed inside.

It hangs on a long (33") bronze chain. All of C&S's long chains do not have clasps, since you slip them over your head anyways! No more worrying about the clasp showing. 

The locket measures 46x38mm and may contain some ages spots which just adds to the character and beauty of the locket. All of these lockets are hand done so your locket will appear very similar to this one shown.

name: "This Old Barn" Alberta Photo Locket
description:
A vintage photo of an old barn in Alberta, Canada on a refinished vintage brass locket. The photo is sealed onto the locket with numerous coats of sealant and varnish. The locket can open and photos can be placed inside.

It hangs on a long (33") bronze chain. All of C&S's long chains do not have clasps, since you slip them over your head anyways! No more worrying about the clasp showing. 

The locket measures 46x38mm and may contain some ages spots which just adds to the character and beauty of the locket. All of these lockets are hand done so your locket will appear very similar to this one shown.

name: "Rocky Mountains" Alberta Photo Locket
description:
A vintage photo of the Rocky Mountains in the Kananaskis, Alberta, Canada area on a refinished vintage brass locket. The photo is sealed onto the locket with numerous coats of sealant and varnish. The locket can open and photos can be placed inside.

It hangs on a long (33") bronze chain. All of C&S's long chains do not have clasps, since you slip them over your head anyways! No more worrying about the clasp showing. 

The locket measures 46x38mm and may contain some ages spots which just adds to the character and beauty of the locket.

name: "Going Steady" Bracelet
description:
So sweet. A rare vintage brass pendant that says "Going Steady" on one side is on a sturdy copper chain with a clasp. The brass disk is about the size of a penny.

Send us a message/email to request the disk on a ring!
Added soon to the shop - the "Going Steady" necklace.

name: Quad Locket
description: Locket that folds out and 4 photos can be placed inside. Very rare and unique and makes such a great keepsake.

name: "Map in a Bottle" Necklaces
description:
Carry your favorite area of the world in a bottle! Vintage maps are placed perfectly inside of tall glass bottles with a cork top! They hang on a long (33") bronze chain with no clasp - just slip it on over your head. All bottles are 100% one-of-a-kind!

The bottles measure 50x16mm. The corks are glued in so that they will never pop out while you wear them.

Contact us if you'd like a custom bottle made showing a specific country or city!

name: "Fleur" Stud Earrings
description:
Small brass disks with scalloped edges and etched fleur de lis are on nickel-free earring posts.

These cute little studs are the perfect size. The disks measure 12mm across and are just over 1mm thick!

name: "Fly" Earrings
description:
These sweet swallow earrings look great on anyone.

Brass swallow birds on nickel-free earring posts. The birds are facing opposite directions - wear them so that the birds face eachother!

The birds measure 17x16mm.

name: "Bon Voyage" Ring
description:
Perfect for the traveller! You can look down at this awesome ring and dream about your next trip!

A boat and the words "Bon Voyage" are etched into a brass disk that sits on a lovey brass ring. The ring is adjustable and has simple detail down the sides. It overlaps under your finger, so it won't pinch like some adjustable rings might.

The disk measures 19mm across and the ring will fit any size from small to large!

name: "Globetrotter" Ring
description:
Perfect for the world traveller or the trip dreamer!

A brass globe showing North and South America sit on a lovey brass ring. The ring is adjustable and has simple detail down the sides. It overlaps under your finger, so it won't pinch like some adjustable rings might.

The globe measures 18mm across and the ring will fit any size from small to large!

name: "See the World" Cufflinks
description:
Perfect for the guy who loves to travel!

Brass globes, showing North and South America, on sturdy gold toned cufflinks. 

The globes measure 18mm in diameter.

name: "Lovey" Stud Earrings
description:
These could not be cuter. Small brass disks etched with the word "LOVE" on nickel-free earring posts. 

The disks measure 11mm across.

name: "Share The Love" Friendship Necklaces
description:
Share the love! This one is sold as a set of 2! Keep one and give one to someone else to always be connected - just like the old school "BFF" necklaces some of us had as kids.

These unique brass lockets fit together to form a heart and can both be opened. Both hang with a small bronze feather and a Czech glass flower bead - one with black and one with cream. They each come on a long (33") bronze 'bead' chain without a clasp - just put it on over your head.

When closed, each locket measures 27mm long and 15mm across at the widest point.

(Price is for one set - 2 necklaces)

name: "Alphabet Feather" Necklace
description:
Wear the first letter of your name, your significant others' name, or your child's name around your neck.  A bronze feather and smaller gold feather hang with a gold (brass) letter of your choice. This piece comes on a long (33") bronze chain.

The large bronze feather measures 40mm long and the letters all measure around 12mm in height. Customize and personalize this monogram necklace by choosing your letter from the drop down menu below. All letters are upper-case.

SOLD OUT - but more coming soon. Email us to reserve one or asking us about a very similar style!

name: "Love Letter" Necklace
description:
The newest of the monogrammed necklaces! A letter of your choie sits on a brass disk etched with the word LOVE. It hangs on a long 33" chain with no clasp - If you want it on a shorter (17" long chai, please let us know after you purchase).

Get your first initial, your last initial, your childs' initial, your significant others initial.... Whatever you want!

Choose a letter from the drop down menu below. All letters are upper-case.

The disks are the size of a penny and measure 19mm across (without loop). The letters all measure approx. 12mm tall (without loop).

Would you prefer it on a disk that says "AMOUR" instead of "LOVE" - just purchase and tell us in the 'notes to seller' section on PayPal. Or shoot us an email.

name: "True North Compass" Necklace
description:
Find your way home! This working compass is paired with a small bronze heart and tiny pair of binoculars!

It hangs on a long (33") bronze chain. All of C&S's long chains do not have clasps, since you slip them over your head anyways! No more worrying about the clasp showing. 

The compass measures 37mm in diameter and is 12mm thick.

name: "Prairie Roots" Necklace
description:
Keep the Canadian prairies close to your heart with this piece. The contrast between the natural real twigs and the shiny gold wheat is the perfect combo of rustic and pretty. A glass bottle with a cork top is filled with real twigs and a brass piece of wheat. It hangs on a long (33") chain.

All of C&S's long chains do not have clasps, since you slip them over your head anyways! No more worrying about the clasp showing. 

The bottle measures 35x10mm.

Please Note: Each vial is made by hand so yours may vary slightly from the one pictured. Real twigs collected from the ground were used in this necklace.

name: "Read the Fine Print" Necklace
description:
This necklace is stylish AND useful - Use it to read the fine print! A working brass magnifying glass hangs with a simple bronze feather charm on a long (33") thick chain. 

All of C&S's long chains do not have clasps, since you slip them over your head anyways! No more worrying about the clasp showing. 

Magnifying glass measures 55mm long and the actual glass measues 20mm in diameter.

name: "Brass Silhouette Birds" Necklace
description:
A NEW version of the ever popular Silhouette Birds necklace - A small silver plated bird sits ontop of a large brass bird on a long (33") chain. 

All of C&S's long chains do not have clasps, since you slip them over your head anyways! No more worrying about the clasp showing. 

The larger bird measures 60mm long and 27mm wide.

(The last photo shows the original Silhouette Birds necklace - find it in the shop under 'necklaces')

name: "First Class" Necklace
description:
Everything is fancier in first class! This airplane necklace is simple, sweet, and will go with any outfit. A bronze airplane with lace covered wings on a long (33") chain. All of C&S's long chains do not have clasps, since you slip them over your head anyways! No more worrying about the clasp showing.  

The plane measures 38x49mm.

All planes are one of a kind since different areas of the lace is applied to the plane by hand. Yours will resemble this plane but will be 100% unique.

name: "Large Quill" Hair Combs
description:
Another hair comb style that you should always have handy!  These super popular hair combs always look great! And YES - they will stay in your hair! :) As long as these are put in correctly, they will hold your hair really well, no matter what hair type you have. We promise. 

In total, these combs measure 85mm x 48mm. When they are in your hair, only the feather shows, and they measure 90mm x 15mm.
Available in gold (brass) or silver - choose from the drop down menu.

The trick to really make them stay in, is going against the way your hair is going. Pull the section of hair back and hold it with one hand, then push the hair comb forward (so the teeth of the comb are going towards your face). It’ll lock in that way and stay really well. You can also comb you hair back with the comb, then push it forwards (towards your face). Even if your hair is up and you want to use one, just always make sure you’re going against the way that the hair is going.

name: "Heart On Your Wrist" Bracelet
description:
A smal brass disk punched with the word LOVE hangs on a gold plated chain with a clasp. 

The love disks measures 10mm across and the bracelet measures 160mm (6.5").

name: "Feather Wrap" Rings
description:
These popular rings are always gaining attention. What we started only doing in gold, we now do in antique copper, bronze and antique silver. These feathers are adjustable and can fit almost any ring size.

The feathers measure 12mm in width.

Choose your color - Gold, Antique Copper, Antique Silver, or Bronze - from the drop down menu below.

name: "Stud" Rings
description:
A perfect mix of brass and silver! A brass pyramid stud sits on a sturdy ring band. The ring is adjustable at the top (not on the underside of your finger), so it will not pinch like other adjustable rings might! When looking at this ring on your finger, you would never know it is adjustable.

Choose between a small stud or a large stud for a chunkier look. The small pyramid stud measures 13x13mm and the large pyramid stud measures 17x17mm. Because they are adjustable, the rings will fit any size from small to large!

This ring is also available with a larger brass stud on a brass ring band for a more chunky look! Find it in the shop under "Large Stud Ring".

name: "Open Heart" Ring
description:
This ring not only looks cute but it also opens up! A tiny brass locket sits perfectly on a brass ring. The ring is adjustable and has simple detail down the sides. It overlaps under your finger, so it won't pinch like some adjustable rings might.

The heart locket measures 13x13mm and the ring will fit any size from small to large!

name: "Love Coin" or "Amour Coin" Rings
description:
These rings are perfect. A brass disk etched with the word LOVE or with the word AMOUR (love in French) sit on a lovey brass ring. The rings are adjustable and have simple detail down the sides. They overlap under your finger, so they won't pinch like some adjustable rings might.

The disks each measure 19mm across and the ring will fit any size from small to large!

Choose between the word "LOVE" or the word "AMOUR" from the drop down list below! $25 each.

name: "Etched" Stud Earrings
description:
Dress these best-selling babies up or down! These black and gold glass domes have etched detail and are set onto nickel-free gold earring posts.

They measure 14mm in diameter.

name: "Lucky" Stud Earrings
description:
Turquoise and gold make up these sweet little earrings. Vintage etched glass is set on nickel-free earring posts.

These little studs measure 9mm across.

Check them out in RED too!

name: "Mosaic" Stud Earrings
description:
These resin domed earrings are etched to give the perfect amount of detail to your lobes! Set on nickel-free earring posts.

Choose between navy or green!

These measure 10mm in diameter.

name: "Studded Stud" Earrings
description:
The perfect every day earring. Brass pyramid studs on nickel-free gold earring studs. 

These measure 13x13mm.

name: "Sweet Rose" Earrings - 2 pairs!
description:
Nothing is sweeter than these tiny rose earrings. Colorful resin roses on nickel-free gold earring posts. These are sold in packs of 2 (pairs) for only $18.

Roses measure around 10mm in diameter.

Choose from the following color sets from the drop down menu below.

name: "Free Bird" Necklace
description:
One of the original Cinder & Sage pieces! It's popularity has kept it around for over 3 years now. A sweet patina blue bird sits ontop of a brass bird cage. - Now also available with a gold plated bird instead. The bird is 'out' of the cage, thus it being 'free'.

It hangs on a long (33") bronze chain. All of C&S's long chains do not have clasps, since you slip them over your head anyways! No more worrying about the clasp showing. 

The cage measures 25x16mm and the bird measures 17x17mm. Choose from the blue or the gold bird from the drop down menu below.

name: "Sage Harp" Necklace
description:
This working harmonica is always the hit of the party! A mini Horner harmonica hangs with a bronze leaf on a long (33") bronze chain. All of C&S's long chains do not have clasps, since you slip them over your head anyways! No more worrying about the clasp showing.

The harmonica measures 35x13mm and the leaf measures 16x10mm.

It plays perfectly in the key of C.

name: Map Plane
description:
A brass airplane is hand covered with an old map. No specific places are showing on this map so it's great gift for anyone! Custom Map Planes can also be ordered - with whichever city you want showing on the wing. Please contact us for a custom order. Real maps are used for these, making them all 100% one of a kind.

This airplane necklace includes a long (33") bronze chain. All of C&S's long chains do not have clasps, since you slip them over your head anyways! No more worrying about the clasp showing. 

The plane measures 38x49mm.

name: Dictionary Definition Lockets
description:
Choose any word you want!
The definition of your favorite or most significat word from an old dictionary is sealed and varnished onto a refinished vintage brass locket. The lockets come on a long (33") bronze chain (without a clasp), can open, and photos can be placed inside. Pages from actual old dictionaries are used for these lockets so all are 100% one of a kind.

Choose from some of the popular words from the drop down list below. If you have a request for a different word, please email us for an order.
** Please remember that your locket will be completely unique and may also contain sub-words and may also show parts of the definitions before or after the word you want. **

The locket measures 46x38mm and may contain some ages spots which just adds to the character and beauty of the locket.

name: Bangkok Map Locket
description:
An old map showing Bangkok, Thailand and area is sealed and varnished onto a refinished vintage brass locket. The lockets come on a long (33") bronze chain (without a clasp), can open, and photos can be placed inside. Actual old maps are used for these lockets so all are 100% one of a kind.

The locket measures 46x38mm and may contain some ages spots which just adds to the character and beauty of the locket.

name: "Flight" Bracelet
description:
A best seller for years! Choose from either a blue patina bird or a brass bird with a bronze twist chain. Bracelet does up with a sturdy bronze clasp.

The bird itself measures 19x17mm and the bracelet measures 20cm in length. Measure your wrist and if you'd like a different size, please leave it in the notes to seller section when you make the purchase.

name: "One Love" Bracelet
description:
Perfect for the globetrotter or nature lover. A small world bead hangs with a bronze heart on a bronze chain. The bracelet does up with a sturdy brass clasp.

The bead measures approx. 8mm across, and the heart measures 14x10mm. The bracelet is 18cm in length, but please let us know if you want it bigger or smaller either by emailing us or putting a note in the 'note to seller' section when you check out on PayPal.

name: "Lacey" Card Cases
description:
Brass card cases covered in black, white or purple lace. Great for business cards or for holding your credit cards and money in your little clutch for a night out on the town!

These can also be covered with maps, dictionary definitions, logos or images - contact us for a custom order.
 
Cases measure 93mm x 57mm.

name: Scarf Pins
description:
These handy pins aren't only good for pinning your scarf in the perfect spot, but also are great on a bag or a toque or used as a brooch on a jacket, sweater or dress! You'll always find new ways to use these little guys. Available in 3 colors of feathers (patina blue/green, gold or copper) or in a gold colored oak leaf. 

Feathers measure 53mm x 12mm, oak leaves measure 38mm x 17mm.

name: "Large Oak" Hair Comb
description:
These super popular hair combs always look great! And YES - they will stay in your hair! :) As long as these are put in correctly, they will hold your hair really well, no matter what hair type you have. We promise. 

3 brass oak leaves combine to make this beauty. 

In total, these combs measure 85mm x 45mm. When they are in your hair, only the oak leaves will show and will measure 85mm x 17mm.

The trick to really make them stay in, is going against the way your hair is going. Pull the section of hair back and hold it with one hand, then push the hair comb forward (so the teeth of the comb are going towards your face). It’ll lock in that way and stay really well. You can also comb you hair back with the comb, then push it forwards (towards your face). Even if your hair is up and you want to use one, just always make sure you’re going against the way that the hair is going.

name: "Large Leaf" Hair Combs
description:
These super popular hair combs always look great! And YES - they will stay in your hair! :) As long as these are put in correctly, they will hold your hair really well, no matter what hair type you have. We promise. 

Available in gold, antique copper, patina blue/green or antique silver.
 
In total, these combs measure 85mm x 48mm. When they are in your hair, only the branch shows, and they measure 85mm x 32mm.

The trick to really make them stay in, is going against the way your hair is going. Pull the section of hair back and hold it with one hand, then push the hair comb forward (so the teeth of the comb are going towards your face). It’ll lock in that way and stay really well. You can also comb you hair back with the comb, then push it forwards (towards your face). Even if your hair is up and you want to use one, just always make sure you’re going against the way that the hair is going. As long as they are in correctly, they will feel super secure and look great all day! Contact us if you are having any problems and we can help you out!

name: "Floating Feather" Hair Combs
description:
These are the perfect to pull the hair out of your face or to add to a simple updo. And YES - they will stay in your hair! :) As long as these are put in correctly, they will hold your hair really well, no matter what hair type you have.

A sturdy metal feather on a gold or silver metal comb. 4 colors available - gold, antique silver, antique copper and patina blue. Choose from the drop down menu below.

The entire comb measures 40x54mm. When it is in your hair, only the feather will show, and they measure 12x54mm.


The trick to really make them stay in, is going against the way your hair is going. Pull the section of hair back and hold it with one hand, then push the hair comb forward (so the teeth of the comb are going towards your face). It’ll lock in that way and stay really well. You can also comb you hair back with the comb, then push it forwards (towards your face). Even if your hair is up and you want to use one, just always make sure you’re going against the way that the hair is going.

name: "Silhouette Birds" Necklace
description:
A Cinder & Sage favorite! Large patina bird with a smaller brass bird ontop. These lovely birds hang on a long (33") bronze chain. All of C&S's long chains do not have clasps, since you slip them over your head anyways! No more worrying about the clasp showing. 

The larger bird measures 60mm long and 27mm wide

Patina is a process of coating brass or copper with various types of chemicals to make it look aged and antique. All items that have gone through the patina process are original and unique. Colors will be similar to the one pictured, but will vary since all are one of a kind.

Now also available with a large brass bird and small silver bird. Find it in the shop under "Brass Silhouette Birds".

name: "Eye Spy" Telescope Necklace
description:
Yep it works!! Spy on a person across the room with this unique conversation starter. This rustic brass telescope can extend out to be fully functionable! Wear it open or closed! Choose your charm - leaf, heart or feather. 

This unique piece hangs on a long (33") bronze chain. All of our long chains do not have clasps, since you slip them over your head anyways! No more worrying about the clasp showing. 
 
Telescope measures 40mm long when closed and 79mm long when fully extended.

name: "Royalty Watch" Necklace
description:
This small pocket watch hangs with a bronze key and a czech glass flower bead and hangs on a long (33") bronze chain. All of C&S's long chains do not have clasps, since you slip them over your head anyways! No more worrying about the clasp showing. 

Yes, this watch works! Just press the top button to open up the front and see the full clock.
 
Out of all of the watches, this is the smallest size - It measures 25mm across.
 
This watch is vintage-inspired (new but has been antiqued). It is battery operated, therefore the battery can easily be changed when needed.

name: "Cinder Watch" Necklace
description:
This pocket watch hangs with a bronze leaf and czech glass flower bead and hangs on a long (33") bronze chain. All of C&S's long chains do not have clasps, since you slip them over your head anyways! No more worrying about the clasp showing. 

Yes, this watch works! Just press the top button to open up the front and see the full clock.
 
This is considered the medium sized watch (same size as the Morning ong Watch and the Tea Time Watch). It measures 40mm across.
 
This watch is vintage-inspired (new but has been antiqued). It is battery operated, therefore the battery can easily be changed when needed.

name: "Feather Wrap" Bangle
description:
Gold feather wrapped around a thin solid brass bangle. 

*Patina blue Feather Wrap Bangles are also available. Picture coming soon*

The widest part of the feather measures 23mm. These are the general bangle size (about 67mm in diameter), but a larger size is also available upon request.

name: Lace Bangles
description:
Solid brass bangles covered with black, white or purple lace. These are great to wear on their own or mixed in with bangles that you already have. 

One size only - these are the general bangle size (about 67mm in diameter). Thick bangles measure 19mm in width and thin bangles measure 9mm in width.

name: 'Bow Drop" Earrings
description:
Insanely cute! Bronze mesh bows hanging on either short or long gold plated kidney wires - your choice!
 
The bows measure 20mm x 13mm. The long kidney wires are 49mm long and the short kidney wires are 30mm long.  
* The photo shows the bows on the LONG kidney wires*

All Cinder & Sage earrings come on nickel-free hooks/wires.

options.name: Bow Drop earrings on SHORT kidney wires
Bow Drop earrings on LONG kidney wires

name: "Large Antique Leaves' Earrings
description:
Green patina leaves hanging on bronze earring hooks. These are the larger version of the Antique Leaves earrings from Collection I, but are slightly more green in color. 

The leaves measure 36mm x 28mm. All Cinder & Sage earrings come on nickel-free hooks.

Due to the patina process, please remember that each leaf is unique! We will pick you out 2 leaves that are most similar in color to each other.

name: "Featherly" Earrings
description:
Detailed bronze feathers on bronze nickel-free earring hooks. Simple and sweet!

Bronze feathers measure 4cm x 1.5cm.

name: Vintage Skeleton Key Necklaces - 5 available
description:
Banged up, rustic and completely unique. These gorgeous actual vintage skeleton keys come from an old key collector and are all different.

The mystery of what these keys what might have opened in the past adds to their beauty. All keys hang on a long (33") bronze chain. All of our long chains do not have clasps, since you slip them over your head anyways! No more worrying about the clasp showing. 

Each of the keys in the photo are currently available - all are one of a kind, so buy them quickly before they are gone! The measurement in the drop down menu is the length of the key. More will be added as they sell.

Feel free to contact us if there is a key & charms combo that you'd like made up for you! We have a large selection of old skeleton keys.

name: "Travel Junkie" Necklace
description:
The perfect necklace for the globe trotter! 

A bronze airplane with globe bead hang on a long (33") bronze chain. All of C&S's long chains do not have clasps, since you slip them over your head anyways! No more worrying about the clasp showing. This airplane necklace has been a crowd favorite for over 3 years.
 
The plane measures 38x49mm.
